name: Sniper Warrior 3D: Desert Warfare
description:
Play as lone survivor in battlefield behind enemy border area, strike back play Sniper Warrior 3D: Desert Warfare brand new first person shooting game.


Unleash the soldier inside you grab sniper rifle and show amazing killer and shooter skills like never before. The game with full of action gun shooting game play, show real skills of marksman aim and shoot down fierce enemy squad. Your mission is to survive this battle against the rebellions terrorist groups. Take perfect aim with sniper scope and shoot for kill shots. Use sniper rifle or light machine gun to strike down maximum enemies with your attack.


Download this amazing FPS game for endless challenges and entertainment like never before.
